SEARCH
Package Server.Network.Client

Class SocketHandler

java.lang.Object
Server.Network.Client.SocketHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
RemoteClient, RemoteView, Scout, Runnable, Remote
public class SocketHandler extends Object implements Runnable, RemoteView, RemoteClient, Scout
This class represents the handler for each socket connection It implements all the method that the server can call also on an RMI connection

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    SocketHandler(Socket socket)
    This constructor is used when the connection is a socket connection

  • Constructor Details

    • SocketHandler

      public SocketHandler(Socket socket)
      This constructor is used when the connection is a socket connection
      Parameters:
      socket - the socket to communicate with the client

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the SocketHandler thread. It sets up the input and output streams, and continuously listens for incoming messages from the client. When a message is received, it deserializes it and executes the corresponding action. If an IOException or ClassNotFoundException occurs, it throws a RuntimeException.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • newTurn

      public void newTurn(String playerID) throws RemoteException
      Notifies the client about a new turn. Sends a ServerMessage of type NewTurnMessage to the client with the specified playerID. If an IOException occurs while sending the message, it logs the error.
      Specified by:
      newTurn in interface RemoteView
      Parameters:
      playerID - the ID of the player who has the new turn
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error

    • askLobbySize

      public void askLobbySize() throws RemoteException
      Asks the client to provide the lobby size. Sends a ServerMessage of type AskLobbySizeMessage to the client. If an IOException occurs while sending the message, it logs the error.
      Specified by:
      askLobbySize in interface RemoteView
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error

    • outcomeSelectTiles

      public void outcomeSelectTiles(List<Tile> tiles) throws RemoteException
      Notifies the client about the outcome of selecting tiles. Sends a ServerMessage of type OutcomeSelectTilesMessage to the client with the list of selected tiles. If an IOException occurs while sending the message, it logs the error.
      Specified by:
      outcomeSelectTiles in interface RemoteView
      Parameters:
      tiles - the list of tiles selected
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error

    • outcomeInsertTiles

      public void outcomeInsertTiles(boolean success) throws RemoteException
      Notifies the client about the outcome of inserting tiles. Sends a ServerMessage of type OutcomeInsertTilesMessage to the client with the specified success status. (Always true, because if the insertion fails, the client is notified with an ErrorMessage) If an IOException occurs while sending the message, it logs the error.
      Specified by:
      outcomeInsertTiles in interface RemoteView
      Parameters:
      success - the success status of the tile insertion
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error

    • outcomeException

      public void outcomeException(Exception e) throws RemoteException
      Notifies the client about an exception. Sends a ServerMessage of type ErrorMessage to the client with the specified exception. If an IOException occurs while sending the message, it logs the error.
      Specified by:
      outcomeException in interface RemoteView
      Parameters:
      e - the exception to notify the client about
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error

    • outcomeLogin

      public void outcomeLogin(String localPlayer, String lobbyID) throws RemoteException
      Notifies the client about the outcome of a login request (only when the login is successful, otherwise the client is notified with an ErrorMessage). Sends a ServerMessage of type OutcomeLoginMessage to the client with the specified local player and lobby ID. If an IOException occurs while sending the message, it logs the error.
      Specified by:
      outcomeLogin in interface RemoteView
      Parameters:
      localPlayer - the local player's name
      lobbyID - the ID of the lobby the player has joined
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error

    • askPlayerInfo

      public void askPlayerInfo(List<Map<String,String>> lobbyInfo) throws RemoteException
      Asks the client for player information. Sends a ServerMessage of type AskPlayerInfoMessage to the client with the specified lobby information. If an IOException occurs while sending the message, it logs the error.
      Specified by:
      askPlayerInfo in interface RemoteView
      Parameters:
      lobbyInfo - the lobby information to ask the player for
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error

    • allGame

      public void allGame(MockModel mockModel) throws RemoteException
      Sends the entire game state to the client. Sends a ServerMessage of type AllGameMessage to the client with the specified mock model representing the game state. If an IOException occurs while sending the message, it logs the error.
      Specified by:
      allGame in interface RemoteView
      Parameters:
      mockModel - the mock model representing the game state
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error

      Specified by:
      endGame in interface RemoteView
      Parameters:

    • crashedPlayer

      public void crashedPlayer(String crashedPlayer) throws RemoteException

      Specified by:
      crashedPlayer in interface RemoteView
      Parameters:
      crashedPlayer - the ID of the crashed player
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error

    • reloadPlayer

      public void reloadPlayer(String reloadPlayer) throws RemoteException
      Notifies the client about the rejoining of a specific player. Sends a ServerMessage of type ReloadPlayerMessage to the client with the ID of the player that rejoined the game. If an IOException occurs while sending the message, it logs the error.
      Specified by:
      reloadPlayer in interface RemoteView
      Parameters:
      reloadPlayer - the ID of the player that rejoined
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error

    • pong

      public void pong(String playerID, String lobbyID) throws RemoteException
      Sends a pong message to the client. Sends a ServerMessage of type PongMessage to the client with the specified player ID and lobby ID. If an IOException occurs while sending the message, it logs the error.
      Specified by:
      pong in interface RemoteClient
      Parameters:
      playerID - the ID of the player
      lobbyID - the ID of the lobby
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error

    • setGameController

      public void setGameController(GameCommand gameController) throws RemoteException
      Sets the game controller for the client. Sets the specified game controller for the client and add the client as a scout to the game controller. If a RemoteException occurs while adding the client as a scout, it logs the error.
      Specified by:
      setGameController in interface RemoteClient
      Parameters:
      gameController - the game controller to set
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error

    • logOut

      public void logOut()
      Logs out the client by closing the socket connection. If an IOException occurs while closing the socket, it logs the error.

    • update

      public void update(Object objects) throws RemoteException
      Updates the client with the specified object. Sends an UpdateMessage to the client based on the type of the object. If the object is of type MockBoard, MockPlayer, MockCommonGoal, or ChatMessage, it sends an UpdateMessage containing the object. If the object is null or of an unknown type, it logs a severe-level message indicating the unknown object type. If an exception occurs while sending the message, it logs the error.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Scout
      Parameters:
      objects - the object to update the client with
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error

    • getGameController

      public GameCommand getGameController()
      Gets the game controller associated with the client.
      Returns:
      the game controller associated with the client
